body.section: A complete clouds.yaml file is available here for reference.

section.p: Populating this section of the clouds.yaml file is required for the HDPI and the Application Lifecycle Service. Installing the other services requires additional sections as documented in the installation procedure for that service. All fields are required unless otherwise indicated.This section begins at the left margin. All other sections begin indented two spaces; look at the complete file to see how all the sections fit together.
section.codeblock: clouds: mycloud: codn_username: codn_password: region_name: region1 cacert: auth: auth_url: https://##.##.###.#:#####/v3 (or v2, depending on the version of Keystone authentication in use) project_name: <admin project name> username: <admin user name> password: <admin password>

dlentry.dd: The username for the HDN (Helion Download Network) account. (The name of the download network used to be CODN.)
The password for the HDN (Helion Download Network) account. (The name of the download network used to be CODN.)
The location where the SSL certificates can be accessed.

dd.p: Note that this must be https, not simply http. This is the value of the OS_AUTH_URL variable from ~/service.osrc
This is the value of the OS_PROJECT_NAME variable from ~/service.osrc
The Username of an account with installation privileges (administrator role). This is the value of the OS_USERNAME variable from ~/service.osrc
The Password for the same account with installation privileges (administrator role). This is the value of the OS_PASSWORD variable from ~/service.osrc
